ISSUE.TITLE: Child table level of DataTables
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Steps to reproduce the problem: > While doing work involving DataTable, I noticed that when I used another DataTable as a child of a child of the parent DataTable, Nop only generates one set of JS code to get the child from the parent only. For example, the layout will look like this: > Table 1 > | - Table 2 > | - Table 4 > | - Table 3 > | - Table 5 > So far table 1, 2, and 3 are working. If I try to display 4 or 5, it will throw JS error due to one getchild_table_name method in the script. > > So does Nop currently support one parent and one child table in DataTable and any plan or suggestion on how to get this scenario to working? Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/74700/child-table-level-of-datatable

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Hotfix: DoesTypeImplementOpenGeneric (#4119) * Hotfix: DoesTypeImplementOpenGeneric The method DoesTypeImplementOpenGeneric now will check all implemented interfaces of type, not only the first occurrence. * Code refactoring Co-authored-by: Sergey Koshelev <sergey.k@nopcommerce.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4234 Added multi child level for DataTables
